page_1.title: St. John's University
page_1.author: Md Sanaul Haque Shanto
page_1.description: St. John's University is a private Catholic university in New York City. The school was founded in 1870 by the Congregation of the Mission (C.M., the Vincentian Fathers) with a mission to provide a growing immigrant population with quality higher education.

page_1.title: Minerva University Undergraduate Admissions
page_1.author: Shahriar Rahman
page_1.description: Real world problem-solving isnâ€™t taught in a lecture hall. Four years, seven countries. The university for students with curiosity, ambition, and a drive to change the world. Join the Class of X. Rethink Higher Education. Bias-Free Admissions. No Application Fees.
